title: Drawing, "View from Old Faithful, Yellowstone Park", July 28, 1892
signed: Signed with initials and dated in graphite, at top: 1892 T. M.
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite at top: from Old Faithful July 28th 1892 T. M.; and again, lower left: sunset / pools. Blood red in foreground/  to Brigh [t] yellow of sunset/ in distance/ cold white edges; and notations at various points: "steam', "darker", etc.
Verso: Inscribed in ?: No. 131.
description: Horizontal view of pools, small geysers, with hills in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "View from Old Faithful, Yellowstone Park", July 28, 1892.
July 28, 1892. Graphite on cream-colored paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-54.
